title: Essentials of Chinese Medicine, 3 Vols.
cleaned_text: No hay productos en el carrito Essentials of Chinese Medicine, 3 Vols. Liu, Z. — Liu, L. 1ª Edición Octubre 2009 Inglés Tapa dura 1200 pags 3600 gr 16 x 24 x 8 cm ISBN 9781848821118 Editorial SPRINGER LIBRO IMPRESO 343,19 €326,03 €IVA incluido Recíbelo en un plazo De 2 a 3 semanas About this book These textbooks systematically introduce the basic health preservation and rehabilitation. They explain the basic methods and theories of acupuncture and moxibustion, as well as expounding upon 151 kinds of Chinese herbs; each Chinese medicinal herb is illustrated.
